title: (03640) El Ravalet - 2 Plaza la Rosaleda
description: Spacious and level place at the entrance of Monóvar. Perfect for spending the night or visiting the town. In the square there is a restaurant and nearby a gas station and a supermarket.

name: El Chico Rubio
title: (03640) El Chico Rubio
description: Introduction... We are Jaap and Kim. With our son Brent, we emigrated to Spain in December 2021 to fulfill our dream. We now run a small scale glamping site with luxury tents between olive and almond trees! If you want to relax and not camp, we also have a deluxe studio, which is equipped for up to 4 people. Of course it is also possible to stay with your motorhome. Beautiful places with wide views in the middle of mountains and olive groves Enjoy nature and relax! Ideal place for walks, motorbike rides and bike rides. The village of Monóvar is 2 km away. Supermarkets, pharmacies, restaurants, etc. can be reached in 5 to 10 minutes by bike. Facilities: Swimming pool 12 x 6 (unheated) Breakfast service Luxurious sanitary facilities Dishwasher Electricity Spacious pitches Pets accepted on a leash. Reservation by phone or app!

title: (03640) Elda - 6D Calle el Tope
description:
Stretch of barren land next to industrial estate and motocross track. Friday afternoon until Saturday afternoon there was no motocross. 
Reasonably quiet night, just a lot of barking dogs in the distance.

Not pretty, quite dusty, no shade, no services.

title: (03600) Elda - 4 Calle Lieja
description:
Parking on street that has not been developed yet.(typically Spanish)
Very secure with lighting and a few local cars.
Easy walk into local bars.
Handy  if climbing at Sax or Marin.

title: (03600) Elda - 72 Avenida Camilo Jose Cela
description: Parking of the football field, without services, well lit at night, asphalt, leveled, quiet night without noise, a walk to the center of town, near a park with swings for children

title: (03660) Novelda - 153 CV-832
description: Parking of the Santuari of Santa Maria Magdalena in Novelda. Near the Restaurant La Mola. Magnificent view. Free point of water (not tap compatible hose, no Threading.) System setting D!) No size limit and places for large vehicles (see photos). The police made a few rounds but said nothing. Castle to visit but check his days depending on the season, for example closed Monday in August.

title: (03610) Petrer - 1A Carrer el Portal
description: Good place to spend the night, illuminated and close to areas of bars, restaurants, etc.

title: (03610) Petrer - 32A Avinguda de la Llibertat
description: Uncovered parking for polygon workers. On weekends it is empty and during the week there will obviously be more cars. It is an open square, paved, without water or anything but to stop and rest for a while is fine

title: (03610) Petrer - 1A Plaça la Molineta
description: Large public car parking on slight slope next to A31,some shade but ideal for a pit stop. Quiet except for road noise.

title: (03610) Petrer - 10 Carrer del Campet
description: Public parking, next to the school touching the fence on the right are level, the others are a little inclined.

title: (03610) Petrer - 14 Polígono Guirney-San Rafael
description: Parking day and night in the town of Petrer, close to a shopping center and carrefour. very quiet place at night

title: (03610) Petrer - 28 Carrer la Font
description: Free parking. Quiet place to sleep. It is in the old town of Petrer worth a visit

title: (03610) Petrer - 83 Carrer de la Foia
description: Good parking lot to go up to the Castell in Petrer. Not suitable for the night as the national road runs right next to it.

title: (03660) Novelda - 6A Carrer Elda
description: Unpaved area, we spent two very quiet nights, a little dirty due to dog feces. 10 min. walking from the center.

name: Asociación Amigos de Acampada Campo Alegre
title: (03630) Asociación Amigos de Acampada Campo Alegre
title_short: (03630) Asociación Amigos de Acampada Campo Alegre
description: Association of Campo Alegre Camping Friends. Various accommodations and campsites where our partners, to contribute of the conservation , can stay in our beautiful place with many services and facilities in the countryside just 3 kilometers from the village of Sax. Many hiking and cycling routes available! Call or whatsapp  recommended.

title: (03660) Novelda - 32 Carrer Alcalde Manuel Alberola

title: (03660) Novelda - 2 Avenida Poeta Ausias March
description: Unpaved space with no restrictions. Close to the center. Mercadona right next door. There are other similar places on the same street. We stayed here one night and there were no problems.

title: (03669) La Romana - 2 Calle San Isidro
description: In the center of the town. Quiet.

title: (03660) Novelda - 2 Carrer la Serreta
description: Industrial Estate. Stood here on the weekend. Completely quiet and not far from the motorway. McDonalds for breakfast around the corner.

title: (03669) Alicante - 6 Lugar la Cruz
description: Just to spend the night and or visit La Romana

title: (03630) Sax - 27 Partida Zapatera
description: Cozy and quiet place. Easy access with Madrid-Alicante motorway exit. Idyllic place for weekends, bridges or holidays as it is located in a strategic point 25 minutes from the sea and 15 minutes from a golf course. It is located in the heart of nature with large plots and large shaded and sunny spaces to choose from. It has 10 motorhome pitches and 30 motorhome parking spots. Please call at least 2 hours before your arrival.

title: (03630) Sax - Nº5 Avenida Historia Bernardo Herr

Beautiful pitch surrounded by vineyards in the mountains of Aspe.

Only possible with registration, as there is a limited number of places available.

title: (03630) Sax - 7 Calle Rey Don Jaime I
title_short: (03630) Sax - 7 Calle Rey Don Jaime I
description: Very good area to spend the night, quiet and bright, and with all the services of the town, bars, bakery, etc etc,

title: (03630) Sax - 17 Camino Cantera
description: Open field daily level overlooking town lots of dog walking but here on a Saturday,fairly peaceful 10 minutes walk up road is picnic area town only down the road for supply,had no disturbances and very clean no water or electric

name: Vista Montana
title: (03638) Vista Montana
description: Close by (400 m) a small village with mountains all around, weekly markets on Tuesdays, Fridays and Saturdays. There are also several bars and restaurants, a mini supermarket, butchers and bakers in the village. Dutch owners. Lots of opportunities for walking and cycling. This is a lovely quiet place with beautiful views, yet close to the village. Also plenty of room for large motorhomes ( 12m) Feel free to drop by!

title: (03680) Aspe - 40Ac Calle Lepanto
description: Free public parking, near the town center with services, you can sleep, cars are usually parked, it is very quiet

title: (03680) Aspe - 17 Avenida Padre Ismael
description: Huge relatively quiet parking, no service ... but to spend a quiet night!

name: Área recreativa El Plano
title: (03639) Área recreativa El Plano
description: Large parking lot next to the grove. There are picnic tables under the trees, restrooms, grills. There is a paved walkway that gives access to some of the tables. There is a large campsite, but vehicles cannot access it. There are also swings and a playground for children. The toilets were closed every time we stopped in the winter.

title: (03680) Alicante - 7 Plaça Poligono 46
description: Esplanade with trees and a picnic area within a park, it has a fountain and rubbish bins, quite flat. It is located next to a road but quiet at night, yes, lots of mosquitoes

title: (03680) -
description: rest area with parking for bicycles. It is next to a not very busy road with benches and tables to sit on. The entrance is complicated for a motorhome or with a trailer (I think it has no water point) the ground is level and it is dirt

title: (03680) Aspe - 99 Avenida Orihuela
description: Ample paved and level space to park next to the Aspe cemetery, a quiet place next to a supermarket, park and close to the town with all kinds of services.

title: (03610) Petrer - Carretera Agost
description: Picnic area with toilets. Natural environment and climbing area.

title: (03698) - 84 Partida Escandella
description: In front of an (always?) abandoned military base. One hike at the foot of the mountain. Stayed here 4 nights without problems.

name: Finca Las Alegrias
title: (03688) Finca Las Alegrias
description:
We are Carlos and Emi and have followed our dream and found our little paradise in Spain.
We would like to share this with nice people.
Carlos likes to work with wood and recycled material and we try to reuse everything as much as possible.
There is still a lot to be made and all ideas are welcome.

We also have a picking garden from which we make our own limoncello and olive oil also from our own trees.
The dog playground is made of recycled wood and the roof of pallets.

Do you like to enjoy and use all this or maybe help yourself, you are very welcome with us.
You may use our sanitary facilities, swimming pool, and have 4 parking spaces for campers.
We also have a guest house for 2 persons for children of helping friends.
Dogs are of course welcome as long as they are friendly and socialised.

So if you would like to build with us or if you want to be creative or just relax and read a book, you can do this with us in the silence along the mountains of the Hondon Valley.

We charge a fee for the parking costs and you will have to pay for the electricity if you need it.
All other services are free.
Maximum length 8 meters
Please call if there is room.

Greetings Carlos & Emi

name: Camperplaats Het kartonnen huis
title: (03680) Camperplaats Het kartonnen huis
description:
Camperplaats The cardboard house known from Ik Vertrek.

An attractive and small-scale Camperplaats in Aspe to relax in a beautiful cycling and walking environment.

A beautiful location just outside the village of Aspe, located on the Campo surrounded by mountains.

Aspe center is easy to reach on foot, by bicycle or car. Aspe has many restaurants and supermarkets, the nearest supermarket is 2 kilometers from our house.

The friendly atmosphere, small scale, hospitality and personal attention will quickly make you feel at home.

We have 4 spacious camper pitches (8x8 meters) that are not suitable for pets.

We have 6 spacious camper pitches (11x7 meters) between the olive trees that are suitable for pets. The olive trees provide shade for your pet. We also have a fenced in dog play area where the dog can run/run free where there is a rubbish bin with free poop bags.

NB
Campers no larger than 8 meters
Reservations can only be made by appointment
Pets allowed
Check-in from 12:00 PM and check-out is until 12:00 PM.

Sunday is a 'day off' for us, hence no check-in and check-out option.

title: (03610) Petrer -
description: Recreational area with barbecues (closed in winter). In the middle of nature, ideal for excursions on foot. In winter there is hardly anyone.

title: (03669) La Romana - 21 CV-842
description: Very sparsely populated village with a large car park where you can park and spend the night, very quiet area with very easy access to dirt tracks and hiking trails (on the same road before the detour to the village is a restaurant where you can eat traditional food and one of the best rice paellas with snails in the province)

title_short: (03688) Hondón de las Nieves - 2 Calle San José
description: Parking space behind the Bodega in the village. Cozy village with shops and restaurants and terraces. Wednesday and Saturday street market from 8 a.m. to 2 p.m. Delicious wine tasting at Bodega and not expensive.

title: (03400) Sax - 216 Plaza Santa Eulalia
description: It is a gas station with a rest area with a shower. When you enter the first impression is very good, then I saw hair in the drain and I thought maybe they just used it recently. My discontent comes when the water does not come out hot and when I have commented on it, they have been indifferent

title: (03698) Agost -

title_short: (03679) Montforte del Cid - 18 Calle E Sector Ubz-4

description: Beautiful place, up high with fantastic views over the Yecla valley. Could only get one third of the way up the hill in our 5.7 mtr. Level plot. Spent 2 nights with no problem.

name: Finca Familia
title: (03113) Finca Familia
description: Finca Familia is run by a Dutch family who have made their dream come true. Thanks to the friendly atmosphere, small scale, hospitality and personal attention, you will soon feel like family. Your pets are also welcome with us. It is a mini campsite located in a quiet area with a beautiful view of the cities of Alicante and Elche. Both towns, the beach and the airport are 15-20 minutes away by car. Alenda Golf is a 5 minute drive away. We offer: showers, toilets, sinks, washing up area, WiFi, pétanque court, spacious pitches, large swimming pool with free deckchairs, possibility to empty the toilet cassette, water and a cozy common room with darts. For an additional fee, we offer a shopping service, electricity, laundry, transfers to the desired places, dog sitting service.Visit our facebook page minicampingfincafamilia or contact us without obligation. Do you want to come and visit us? Of course we like it ;-) Because navigation sometimes requires our guests to drive on impassable roads, we strongly advise you to contact us beforehand. We can then provide you with the correct route so that you arrive without problems. We look forward to welcoming you to our Finca, Sincerely, Finca Familia ☀.

title: (03400) Villena - 1 Carretera Alicante
description: Washing of motorhomes with ladder

title: (03698) Agost - 128 Partida Sol del Camp
description: Parking next to the Agost train stop and the beginning of the Vía Verde del Maigmó. Site for 3 motorhomes. Every once in a while a train passes by. quiet place

title: (03339) Marxant -

Access by dirt track in perfect condition and suitable for all types of vehicle. Ideal place to visit the San Cayetano Mountain Park and start one of the most classic hiking trails in the area.

title: (03339) Crevillent -

title_short: (03205) Elx - Avinguda Profesor Enrique Tierno Galván

Credit card paiement is currently not working and the machine says "No Cambio" so bring your small bills and coins.

description: Parking with views of the sunset and the Atalaya castle. Next to the mountain, the start of the Via Ferrata route. You have the city at 1min. Quiet area with viewpoints and picnic area.

title: (03109) Tibi - 16 Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: We made a stop on our route is this area. It is a large parking lot next to the BP gas station with a part of asphalt and a part with a lot of shade of pine trees just behind the Maigmó restaurant. Quiet area with a large pine forest ideal for a while to rest and eat something. No services other than those of the restaurant itself.

name: Camp El Tranquilo - Camp Pinoso
title: (03657) Camp El Tranquilo - Camp Pinoso
description:
The 42 segregated pitch Touring park open 365 days is located in a small hamlet just outside the quaint traditional town of Pinoso (El Pinos), on the Valencian / Murcia border the area is scattered with many working hamlets which are rich in history and strong in cultural traditions. Fiestas are many and some continue for days.
The Adult only site is Tranquil, very peaceful and above all quiet we are surrounded by Olive and Almond groves as well as acres and acres of vineyards, also dotted around us are orange and lemon trees.

title: (03400) Villena - 4 Calle San Juan
description:
Closed to Road and near to other parkplace, its above mainroad but hardly noisy waves car.
i think weekends Will be busy With teen drinking but its safer than other and shadowy and tablets to relax.
good place to start different hikes and ferratas among the rock.

title: (03207) Elx - 9 Calle Santua Vg Cabeza
description: Large car park where CCs are allowed. 2 km from the Palmeraie along a park which leads to the entrance alongside the university. It looks like an abandoned site, but this address was given to us by security agents.

New Biar Motorhome Area,
near the center to visit Castle and the town where we can see its streets and pass the Banana tree one of the largest specimens in the country. natural landscapes with routes for hiking, biking and climbing areas, etc.
Views of the Sierra del Fraile

let's respect the environment

It has trees that provide shade. There is very close a vegan restaurant and supermarkets and bars. The only two drawbacks? There is traffic noise as is normal in the city and on Thursdays there is a market.

title_short: (03202) Elche - 1 Avinguda de la Universitat d'Elx

title_short: (03410) Biar - 2 Carretera de Biar a Bañeres

title_short: (03202) Elx - 5 Carrer Nuestra Señora de la Cabeza

Without service but about 300 m from the municipal park where there are fountains and toilets. Also next to the downtown pools. Next to the tourist office. Interesting to do the Ili Palmir route especially if you are traveling with children.

description: From the A-7 take exit 468/469 (depending on direction) and follow CV-815 to Castalla. Once there, follow signs to the sports center. The person who facilitates loading water and electrical connection is in charge of the Sports Center. Hotel services and shopping are in the town, about 400 m. And the gas station 500 m. Visit the castle, the House of Fester and not miss the Moors and Christians in early September.

name: LACAVA
title: (03430) LACAVA
description: GAMPING "LA CUESTA" CV 802 km2 -Situated between the Nacional Parks of El Maigmo and La Sierra Mariola known for their natural year round beauty, walking trails, cycle routes, peace and tranquility and multiple fresh water springs. Secure parking, use of barbecue and seasonal use of swimming pool. Relax with open views across the valley to the Castle of Castalla.  Historic Bocairent, Alcoy, Biar and Pou Clar (Ontinyent) nearby.

title: (03340) Albatera - 235 Partida Lomas Gp. 2
description:
Beautifully landscaped pitch in our garden, for max 2 campers up to 7.5 m,

with access to water electricity. toilet, washing machine and dryer, swimming pool, petanque court,
5 km from Mercadona and other shops and restaurants
 30 km from the sea or Alicante and Torrevieja (Santa Pola, La Marina) possibility to rent a car or scooter.

Mandatory notification by e-mail.

longer period negotiable on site.

title: (03400) Villena - 4 Calle Vinalopo
description: Quiet place for one night and keep going

title: (03202) Elche - Avinguda de la Universitat d'Elx
title_short: (03202) Elche - Avinguda de la Universitat d'Elx
description: Parking in a quiet area, near sports area and supermarkets. with some shade depending on the time of day

title: (03293) Elx - 9009 Lugar Llano S Jose Urbanizable
title_short: (03293) Elx - 9009 Lugar Llano S Jose Urbanizable
description: Brand new hospital parking lot.

title: (03339) Crevillente - 11 CV-875
description: Drinking water and air service at the Repsol gas station

title: (03293) Elx - 18 Avenida Alcalde Ramon Pastor
description: 2 km from the city center. Lots of free space. I slept one night with no problem.

title: (03689) Hondón de los Frailes -
description: A lovely abandoned quarry with great views.

title: (03410) Biar - Unnamed Road
description: Good place to spend the night and play sports. Narrow but paved road, with a motorhome you can park at the beginning of the climb if you do not see it clearly.

title: (03204) Elche - 6 Travesía Manuel López Qu 1iz
description: Place in clay, not flat. Suitable for vans. No service. Exposed to the sun, with little shade.

title: (03203) Elche - 4A Avenida de Santa Pola
description: Excellent and vast site to visit the palm grove. Between school and civil guard!

title: (03293) Elche - 1161 Partida Algorós
description: Safe place to visit the city and parks.

title: (03202) Elx - 10 Carrer José Antonio Cañete Juárez
title_short: (03202) Elx - 10 Carrer José Antonio Cañete Juárez
description: Parking area for any vehicle, safe and quiet, next to police headquarters, park, shopping center, sports city.

title: (03690) - 71 Partida Boqueres Polig C
description:
Welcome to the best spot to be. 

Hi!! We offer a great pitch on our private property. 
The property is close to a beautiful mountain range with lot of trails for hiking or biking. 
Our house is about 40 mt from the spot for parking, we are happy to help on anything you need. We can provide delicious home made food if you wish. 
There isn't toilet on the spot, so only campers with their own toilet. 
You could use our toilet at home (if you are a van) but we are not always there. Better ask before planing to come. 
 Beaches are approximately 20 minutes drive away !!
Nearby San Vicente, 15min away, is a town, not touristy. Facilities include a large supermarket, banks, post office, shops, garage, bars and restaurants.
Alicante is 25 minutes away full on attractions for tourism. 
 No facilities for disposing of either grey or black water. 
We have 3 dogs, after a fence. 
Please phone me in advance or email for more information, to arrange when you would like to stay. 
Thank you and I look forward to meeting you
Best wishes Mario!!

title: (03203) Elx - 21A Carrer Escultor Capuz
description: Plenty of free roadside parking for any size

title: (03293) Elche - 225 CV-875
description: Point close to two primary schools so the vehicle will be monitored during the week due to the influx of people in the area.

title: (03340) Alicante -
description: Stop for the Rambla Salada hike. Several level outskirts. Very quiet night, no traffic.

title: (03330) Polígon Industrial Catxapets - 13 Carrer Ibi
description: Place in a quiet and uncrowded area.

title: (03203) Elx - 2 Carrer Morera
description: A fairly large car park. I would say more for vans than motorhomes (they go more unnoticed.  (4G Vodafone 2/4, Movistar 3/4)

title: (03699) Alicante (Alacant) - 40 Vía Pa Fragata
description: Quiet viewpoint at night, perfect for seeing Alicante in the background.

title: (03203) Elche - 2 Calle de le Corbusier
description: Good place to park and visit the city of Elche. Very close to Caravanas Cruz.

title: (03690) Sant Vicent del Raspeig - 40 Avinguda de L'Astronomia
title_short: (03690) Sant Vicent del Raspeig - 40 Avinguda de L'Astronomia
description: Small flat space to park quietly. We stay there for a picnic but certainly possible for one night. It's quiet so very good for a rest stop.

title: (03290) Elche - CV-8500
description: Repsol gas station with the option of filling up with water.

title: (03109) Urbanització Bon Aire -
description: Very quiet and beautiful spot on an abandoned orchard. flat serfice with room for around 4 vans. not recommended for motorhomes as the 30m of dirt track is quite rough. Close to the old abandoned dam that is worth a visit.

title: (03290) Elche - 14 Carretera Alicante-Murcia
description: Gravel parking lot near the Palm Park in Elche

title: (03109) Tibi - 28A Avinguda les Llometes
description: Perfect spot to visit the city Tibi. It is a little hike up to the city, but not far. Down its possible to folow the river and hike to the lake, beautiful journey! The parking is flat, and plenty of space, also for big vehicles. Next door is a public swimmingpool with hot shower etc.  Good for a quite night or two and explore.

title: (03420) Castalla - 1000 Lugar I Pd 3
description: Large car park attached to a busy road during the day. It is paved.

title: (03430) Onil - 1 Carrer Jaume I
description: Motorhome area next to gas station and soccer field, with all services, quiet to sleep, starting point for the hiking route and visit town.

title: (03690) Urbanització el Savinar - Unnamed Road
description: Very large parking lot as a starting point for hikes and MTB. Is also easily accessible for large mobile homes up to 8m in length via a paved road. There are no prohibition signs for the parking lot - only behavioral requirements for the use of the area. See pictures. We only stayed here during the day during the low season, but we could certainly have stayed overnight.

title: (03320) Torrellano - 25 Circunvalación de Alicante
description: GALP gas station with water and air dispenser. The type of dispenser is trigger but the flow is medium.

title: (03430) Onil - 30 Avinguda de la Pau
description: Self-service laundry in the urban area of Onil and near the motorhome area.

title: (03109) Tibi -
description: Shared parking with some hikers,  where you can park without restrictions, motorhomes are normally allowed to stay one overnight. Very close to the Tibi reservoir.  You can spend the day and the night without any problem.  It can be reached by a very narrow road and a few metres of track.

title: (03410) Biar - Unnamed Road
description: Recreational area with space for 2 or 3 vans. There are tables and recreation areas. Spectacular area, with lush forests, walking and cycling routes. It is accessed by a dirt road suitable for vans. No coverage.

title: (03296) Matola - 9 Carrer Rosales
description: Parking outside the hacienda/restaurant La Roscana. In the middle of agricultural fields, ample parking, away from the road, quiet, no service.

name: Cementerio Torrellano
title: (03320) Cementerio Torrellano
description: Parking at the cemetery. You can hear the highway. Ideally located near Alicante airport.

title: (03690) Urbanització el Savinar - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful spot with great views. Best to get there from Tibi, then it works with vans and smaller motorhomes. BUT getting there from Urbanització el Savinar it is ONLY recommended to go with a 4x4 and raised in small vans. Absolutely no CCs. Very small, steep and washed out gravel (see 4th pic).

title: (03400) Villena - Autovía de Alicante
description: Service station parking and restaurant, cafe, open 24/24. Bathroom. No service for motorhome. Maybe possibility of having water at the station, asking for it. Good for a lunch stop or a night.

name: Finca Guillermo Murcia
title: (30529) Finca Guillermo Murcia
description: Shaded parking in front of our b&b, in the middle of nature! Beautiful pool available, extremely quiet! Starting point for beautiful walks, centrally located. (lots of bodegas). Only delicious breakfast at 10 euros / pp obligatory to take and possibility to take dinner by chef Wim. Electricity connection 5 euros. Own drinks and snacks are not allowed in the b&b! In June-July-August-September, pool access 10 euros per person per day.

title: (03100) Xixona - 315 Diseminado Sector 5
description: Very quiet place surrounded by nature, access is by a fairly narrow road, esplanade for about 5 vans.

title: (03690) San Vicente del Raspeig - C. el Martillo
title_short: (03690) San Vicente del Raspeig - C. el Martillo
description: Ample parking for the night, continuous security surveillance and very quiet

title: (03293) Daimés -
description: We are located between Elche and La Foia, fully enclosed private land near the Alcudia archaeological site. 3 pitches maximum for more comfort and tranquility. 6A electricity, water drain filling, Wi-Fi, tennis court, pétanque track, cycle path nearby, bicycle and tandem, helmet and life jacket available, start of the Rio Vinalopo discovery hike, library, swimming pool. a moment of relaxation with jacuzzi and sauna

title: (03430) Alicante - 7 Plaça 7
description: Recreation area near the village of Onil, with toilets and public water source. Tables and benches for eating, as well as a barbecue.

title: (03320) Torrellano - 2027 Partida Torrellano Alto
description: Caravan & Camper Parking. Overnight acceptance & airport transfer included in price. Nice garden & bbq area available.

title: (03320) Torre del Pla - 31 Carrer de la Pau
title_short: (03320) Torre del Pla - 31 Carrer de la Pau
description: Simple dirt parking. Next to downtown for groceries and laundromat 2 blocks away. Very good Turkish kebab not far away. To check if there are not market days. We spent the weekend there with no worries.

title: (03100) Valle del Sol - Unnamed Road
description: If you like isolation and nature, you've come to the right place. Large platform with the possibility of staying day and night, no bans. 3 or 4 places available requiring wedging. Magnificent view of the surrounding mountains and the canyon of various colors. A spectacle that nature offers you so respect this place. Hikes possible in the gorges with proper footwear.

title: (03320) Torre del Pla - 16 Avinguda de Illice
title_short: (03320) Torre del Pla - 16 Avinguda de Illice
description: Laundromat with dog machine.

title: (03320) Torre del Pla - 31 Carrer Aeroport
description: Wide and well leveled field on the outskirts of Torrellano. It is very close to the airport and it is noisy although at night from 0:30 to 6:30 there is no air traffic. Scandal bakery 3 min walk.

title: (03349) San Isidro - Partida veintiuno nr 14
description:
Small-scale and cozy camper place along the A7. Beautiful garden with swimming pool. Dogs can play to their heart's content in our enclosed garden of 10,000 m2. Chemical toilet can only be used if an organic product is used. (We do not use any chemicals)
Also no dogs and sunscreen in the pool.
Car available.

Spoken languages:
Dutch English German French Spanish.

Hasta luego!

title: (03320) Torre del Pla - s/n Ctra. Alicante-Elche
title_short: (03320) Torre del Pla - s/n Ctra. Alicante-Elche
description: Parking 4 min (2.5 km) from the airport. Next to restaurant almendros. Ideal for picking up someone at the airport. In that case, take a bus parking at the airport

title: (03320) Torre del Pla - 31 Carrer del Llimó
title_short: (03320) Torre del Pla - 31 Carrer del Llimó
description: Parking for the night - level ground on gravel - no services - 80 m from some restorations/ bar. Ideal for those who need to pick up or drop someone off at the AirPort.

name: Casa Castor Catral
title: (03349) Casa Castor Catral
description: Small-scale camper place for 2 to 3 campers, located in a quiet place. Large enclosed garden with several seating areas and a self-service pool bar. Opportunity to wash. Pets allowed.

address.street: Azarbe de los Partidores/Partida El Realengo

title: (03690) Sant Vicent del Raspeig - 18 Carrer de la Baiona Baixa
title_short: (03690) Sant Vicent del Raspeig - 18 Carrer de la Baiona Baixa
description: Parking next to the sports center and in front of the Local Police. At 10 minutes from the center. There is a bakery in front and 2 supermarkets and pharmacies within 200 meters

title: (03006) Alicante (Alacant) - 82B Carretera d'Ocaña
description: Private parking if you want you can leave any vehicle here, 24 hours monitoring

title: (03690) San Vicente del Raspeig - 36 Calle Rafael Altamira
title_short: (03690) San Vicente del Raspeig - 36 Calle Rafael Altamira
description: Speed queen lavanderia, self service or service wash, new machines, street park or in gravel Park opposite.  very good value and friendly owner

title: (03690) Sant Vicent del Raspeig - 35B Carrer Major
title_short: (03690) Sant Vicent del Raspeig - 35B Carrer Major
description: Velodrome car park. Next to the university and 10 minutes from the center of San Vicente.

title: (03158) Crevillent - 1A Partida San Felipe Neri
description:
Large car park without amenities, next to a natural park. Large campsite nearby.

Overnight stays are no longer allowed since March 7, 2023, the park authorities have introduced new rules here.

title: (03690) San Vicente del Raspeig - 2 Avenida Sevilla
title_short: (03690) San Vicente del Raspeig - 2 Avenida Sevilla
description: Clean Bubbles Cafe... self service laundry. Excellent service, friendly staff, coffee or beer, breakfast, lunch or dinner while you wait. Highly recommended.

title: (03690) San Vicente del Raspeig - 88 Carrer Alicante
title_short: (03690) San Vicente del Raspeig - 88 Carrer Alicante
description: In Repsol itself there is a laundry room for motorhomes and campers, just on the other side of the gas station there is a building that is a laundry service where you have washers and dryers, they sell butane/propane gas bottles, but I am not sure if they fill you up the gas tank!

title: (03339) Crevillent - 535 CV-904
description: Possibility of refueling fresh water and discharge of gray. The service also offers the discharge of black water, the place of discharge visible in photos 3 and 5. It is enough to lift a small grate.

title: (03349) San Isidro - 9 Calle Huertos Familiares
description: A very quiet street in front of San Isidro sports center (Alicante)

title: (03690) San Vicente del Raspeig - 4 Calle Río Ebro
title_short: (03690) San Vicente del Raspeig - 4 Calle Río Ebro
description: Good parking near the city, the police allow overnight stays, there is a large park right next door where there are playgrounds, picnic areas and public toilets.

name: Marjal Costa Blanca Camping & Resort
title: (03158) Marjal Costa Blanca Camping & Resort
description: Marjal Costa Blanca Camping & Resort, It's great camping, new, clean, secure. Indoor and heated pool. Animations all the year. There is everything on site. Even the sound of the highway next door. Given the number in this month of February, some like ...

title: (03349) S. Isidro - 1 Calle Belgica
description: Repsol petrol station with a small supermarket and laundromat with washing machines and dryers. Very good way to wash the mobile home. The pressure washer is great. There is a staircase so that you can also clean the roof. Next door there is a car wash in 2 different heights. Staff very nice and helpful.

title: (03349) San Isidro - 3 Calle Salvador
description: Barbecues area with very quiet parking in San Isidro Alicante

title: (03009) Alicante (Alacant) - 2 E.S. Repsol
description: Repsol gas station with washing area and water source.

title: (03009) Alacant - 36A Calle Fortuny
description: Parking in the commercial area of Rabassa, opposite the military base, Decathlon and McDonalds. You can stay overnight nights, McDonald's establishment services, workshop near Dia supermarket and more.

title: (03690) San Vicente del Raspeig - 94 Carrer Alicante
title_short: (03690) San Vicente del Raspeig - 94 Carrer Alicante
description: Shopping car park. We stopped during the day without problems. Toilets and games for children

title: (03006) Alicante (Alacant) - 4 Carretera d'Ocaña
description: LPG at Shell garage.

title: (03139) Barri Alt - 1032A Partida Valverde Alto
description:
Small-scale camper place for max 5 campers.
Beautifully situated between Santa Pola and Elche, both places are 7 km away and easily accessible by bike.
Supermarket and restaurants less than 2km.
Please call in advance for availability.
Not suitable for children under 12 years!
NB! Water and empty waste water tank or toilet only for guests! Minimum stay 2 nights!

title: (30648) El Salado -
description: Quiet parking, at the foot of the track with easy access and close to the road. No services. Near the beginning of the hiking route of Las Pozas del Río Chicamo.

title: (30510) Yecla - Camino de la Anchura
description: Parking spaces on asphalt. Complete supply and disposal. Separate taps for cassette cleaning and drinking water. Taps without thread. The parking space is next to a playground and a skate park. The young trees still offer little shade. The city center is 2km away.

title: (30510) Yecla - 23 Avenida Feria
description: Large street with parking available. In front of the Guardia Civil supermarket and Aldi. Bus stop nearby Outside the trade fair, parking is also available at the trade fair car park. Public toilet in the bus station. Several bars. Park and fantastic children's playground.

title: (30648) Ricabacica -
description: Magnificent place in the middle of the extremely quiet desert where we spent the night and in the morning a short walk on the summit where you have a crazy panorama. It is next to an abandoned house with access on a paved road

title: (03005) Alicante (Alacant) - 9 Calle Isla de Corfú
description: Great place to spend the night, in a very quiet and bright neighborhood street. A lot of parking at night. For the most complicated day because it is next to two schools. 5 minutes from the exit of the highway.

title: (30510) Yecla - 31D Avenida Literato Azorín
description: Street behind the hospital, much quieter than the next avenue, on the main avenue and offering the same services on the other side of the park, ideal for children.

title: (03007) Alicante (Alacant) - Carrer Ana Navarro
description: Very spacious laundry with good machines, 100 meters before you have a place to load and unload (parking) 18kg/4kg all including the dryer for 7min

name: Finca La Signatura
title: (03139) Finca La Signatura
description: Finca La Signatura. A little paradise for holidaymakers with 3 spacious, bushed areas for motorhomes or caravans. Beautiful large swimming pool, trampoline and a bowling alley. Nice and clean sanitary facilities. Anne and Nick make you feel welcome on this beautiful and peaceful finca nestled between the plantations. There is also a holiday home and guest room. Overall a lovely place to stay. The area is flat so excellent for cycling, 6 km from the beach and 7 km from the palm city of Elche. Shops in the immediate vicinity. Due to the limited number of places, calling/Whatsapp in advance is recommended.

title: (30520) Jumilla - Unnamed Road
description: After 1 km of track, just after the exit, small horizontal esplanade next to the track, 50 m from the pass on the right. If you see a mini rikiki chapel, it's 100 m before!

title: (30510) Yecla - 21D Camino Castillo
description: Large parking espalier, both of the bottom are relatively flat. Located next to the cemetery and sports center.

title: (30510) Yecla - 51 Calle de la Rambla
description: Laundromat in Yecla plus dryer.

title: (03008) Alicante - 57 Avinguda de Alcalde Lorenzo Carbonell
title_short: (03008) Alicante - 57 Avinguda de Alcalde Lorenzo Carbonell
description: Good place to notice very wide street where trucks stop, I have been 3 days without problems. That is very noisy for the day because of traffic and institutes. It is street parking, so there is no service. Bus 02 on the same street, 20m walk to the center of Alicante. Bakeries, Bars, supermarkets, cinema all nearby

title: (03158) Catral - 74B Camino lo Chicharra
description: Quiet, small-scale camping spot near the El Fondo nature reserve. 2.5 km from the village of Catral. Swimming pool available. Bikes for rent in the village. Cozy restaurants, open all year round. 6 seats.

title: (03440) Ibi - 15 Carrer Francesc Tarrega
description: Quiet parking, you can start a hiking trail or mountain bike. There is a hermitage to visit, from above you can see a panoramic view of Ibi.

title: (03008) Alacant - 3 Calle Metalurgias
description: Good place to spend a few days without problem and very quiet, next to a dog park and near the police. Near buses and supermarkets.

title: (03158) Catral - 12A Camino de lo Chicharra
description: Agricultural farm with production of vegetables and fruits that can be purchased very fresh from the field. Hof has a small parking lot where you can park mobile homes or campers. Small flock of sheep, goats, chicken coop, geese. In addition to a barbecue area and tables, there are also toilets and showers, as well as sinks with hot water. Fresh water supply possible. The host speaks Spanish and English.

title: (03158) Catral - 2I Calle Extremadura
description: Lots of parking available right next to supermarket and cafe and restaurants. We had lovely Indian a few meters away. Our Motorhome is 8 meters and we parked for free no problem

title: (30510) Yecla - 21C Calle de Valencia
description: Water has low pressure but it works, toalet is clean and free. Repsol gas station open 6.00 to 22.00.

title: (03440) Ibi - 15 Calle Pablo Sorozábal
description: Parking next to a large park, there are bars nearby. In the park there are games for the little ones and a dog park, with water for the dogs. In September it is not active because they are parties and put on the fair.

title: (03005) Alicante (Alacant) - 1 Calle Numancia
description: Large parking spaces and, as good as flat. At 3 km from the center, for cyclists, the descent/ascent to the center is 62 meters. No services.
